txt.en: 'It is time, then, that I confront my father and make him atone for his deeds. Thank you for all of your help, [placeholder].'
'The Wild Huntsman is revered by all of the clans, for he rules over the gwirod. His judgement is final and exacting.\n\n'We should leave this place immediately.'
Clear a path through the wights for Lhucu.
Follow Lhucu through the main gate
Let Lhucu know that the path has been cleared below.
Banish the fell spirit Mostun from the mortal world.
Leave Lhan Gogledh as the Huntsman commanded.
You have accompanied Lhucu to the village of Lhan Gogledh to confront her father, Trehéarn Brenin.
'I need a few moments to regain my strength.'

'It appears that my father has fallen completely under the sway of Mostun and has driven all of our people from the village. Look! He is protected by the abominations that walk the cairns!\n\n'Go, [placeholder], and clear a path so that I might confront my father.'
